oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ard Hoyt correspondence with John C. Calhoun, 1823 October 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hoyt, Ard, 1770-1828
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Annual report authored Brainerd Mission founder Ard Hoyt for review by the United States Secretary of War John C. Calhoun providing an update on the progress of the Cherokee mission school.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cherokee Indians -- History; Cherokee Indians -- Missions
Calhoun, John C. (John Caldwell), 1782-1850; Hoyt, Ard, 1770-1828
Brainerd Mission
